output_list.criticism: The transfer function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect balances and potentially loss of funds.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _from[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect balances and potentially loss of funds.
The approve function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _extraData[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect balances and potentially loss of funds.
The allowance function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _extraData[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect balances and potentially loss of funds.
The receiveApproval function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _extraData[msg.sender]. This can lead to incorrect balances and potentially loss of funds.
